name: Pip (TheJackOfClubs)
description:
Help Pip get to the magic d20! Use the arrow keys/WASD and space to move Pip around the level. The dice will follow Pip's actions on its own grid, and its rolls can be used to unlock doors for Pip to go through!

Other info

Adjust music volume (or turn it off) via the Options menu

The dice in the top-right is an accurate d6, and will track your motion unless it is blocked. The lines on the background behind Pip correspond to the cells the dice rolls around in.

Hint

If there isn't a square of four empty tiles for the dice to roll around in, then it will always have the same number facing up whenever it's in that position. So sometimes you can solve the puzzle by only thinking about where you need the dice to be to get the number you need. (rather than trying to do all kinds rotations in your head!)

Credits

Made in two days for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, where the theme was "roll of the dice"
All art produced during the jam
Most sound effects made with bfxr and Audacity, others by Setuniman, colorsCrimsonTears, BeezleFM, and ertfelda from Freesound
Music by DSTechnician from Pixabay
